thread.title: Afternoon tea time in Beijing r&f Renaissance hotel
thread.title_full: Afternoon tea time in Beijing r&f Renaissance hotel - Review of Renaissance Beijing Capital Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

title: Afternoon tea time in Beijing r&f Renaissance hotel
text: Come to Beijing tourism, original order of ordinary bussiness room, the recommendation of the check-in at the front desk staff when chose the club room, and really got a different experience, be able to enjoy free breakfast, dinner and afternoon tea, very convenient. Come with afternoon tea, because the baby still in the room to rest, so I want to take back packaging small dessert, at this point, pearl, who enthusiastic help me pack , asked me whether I need to give the baby hot cup of milk, special services. I will also choose Beijing r&f Renaissance hotel next time.
